scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a deployed customer churn prediction model using a model inversion attack.  The attacker leverages carefully crafted inputs to the model and analyzes the outputs to infer private customer attributes such as income and address details.
initial_goal: Evaluate the robustness of the customer churn prediction model against adversarial attacks.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking:  A large bank uses a machine learning model to predict customer churn and proactively offer retention incentives. The model is trained on a dataset containing sensitive customer financial and demographic information.
